    class Profile {
        +profile_id: INTEGER (PK)
        profile_name: TEXT
    }

    class Users {
        +user_id: INTEGER (PK)
        username: TEXT
        password: TEXT
        profile_id: INTEGER (FK)
        school_id: INTEGER (FK)
        class_id: INTEGER (FK)
        org_id: INTEGER (FK)
    }

    class Organizations {
        +org_id: INTEGER (PK)
        org_name: TEXT
    }

    class Schools {
        +school_id: INTEGER (PK)
        org_id: INTEGER (FK)
        school_name: TEXT
    }

    class Levels {
        +level_id: INTEGER (PK)
        school_id: INTEGER (FK)
        level_name: TEXT
    }

    class Classes {
        +class_id: INTEGER (PK)
        level_id: INTEGER (FK)
        class_name: TEXT
    }

    class TeacherAssignments {
        teacher_id: INTEGER (FK)
        class_id: INTEGER (FK)
    }

    class Data_Table {
        +id: INTEGER (PK)
        date: TEXT
        username: TEXT
        profile: TEXT
        chatbot_ans: TEXT
        user_prompt: TEXT
        tokens: TEXT
    }

    class Files {
        +id: INTEGER (PK)
        user_id: INTEGER (FK)
        name: TEXT
        data: BLOB
        metadata: TEXT
        subject: TEXT
        topic: TEXT
        level: TEXT
    }

    class Vector_Stores {
        +id: INTEGER (PK)
        vectorstore_name: TEXT
        data: BLOB
        user_id: INTEGER (FK)
        class_id: INTEGER (FK)
        school: TEXT
        level: TEXT
    }

    class Vector_Stores_Link {
        vectorstore_id: INTEGER (FK)
        file_id: INTEGER (FK)
    }

    class Prompt_Templates {
        +id: INTEGER (PK)
        prompt_name: TEXT
        prompt_text: TEXT
        user_id: INTEGER (FK)
    }

    class App_Functions {
        +function_id: INTEGER (PK)
        function_name: TEXT
        description: TEXT
    }

    class OrgFunctionAccess {
        profile_id: INTEGER (FK)
        function_id: INTEGER (FK)
        access: BOOLEAN
    }

    class SchoolFunctionAccess {
        school: TEXT
        profile_id: INTEGER (FK)
        function_id: INTEGER (FK)
        access: BOOLEAN
    }

    class LevelFunctionAccess {
        level: TEXT
        profile_id: INTEGER (FK)

        access: BOOLEAN
    }

    class ClassFunctionAccess {
        class_id: INTEGER (FK)
        profile_id: INTEGER (FK)
        function_id: INTEGER (FK)
        access: BOOLEAN
    }


    class Function_Prompt_Link {
        function_id: INTEGER (FK)
        prompt_id: INTEGER (FK)
    }
